citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1030 on 12 MAY
2021.
Facility representative was present on arrival and met inspector at gate of facility. Representative stated that he was on
his way to several appointments he had previously scheduled and was not able to stay for the inspection today. He also
stated there were no other responsible adults present to accompany the inspector.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1030 on 12 MAY 
2021. 
Facility representative was present on arrival and met inspector at gate of facility.  Representative stated that he was on 
his way to several appointments he had previously scheduled and was not able to stay for the inspection today.   He also 
stated there were no other responsible adults present to accompany the inspector. 
 
 
 
End Section
